selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Compute the total cost by multiplying quantities with their respective prices and summing them up.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use calc_numeric to evaluate the expression '(4 * 3) + (5 * 4)'.

new_skill_specs.name: extract_prices_from_image
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract the price per kilogram for oval and star-shaped beads from the attached image.
edge_cases: Image is blurry or text is unclear
Prices are not in expected format
